titleNullable: Captioned Moving MNIST Dataset - Easy Version
subtitleNullable: Videos of moving digits used to train diffusion models for video generation
descriptionNullable:
Note: This dataset comes with 4 different levels of difficulty. This is the **Easy Version**. In this version, only linear affine transformations in one direction are applied to the digits. Digits can move out of the frame.

This dataset contains videos of moving digits. Each video has a corresponding text file containing captions for each frame to describe the movement of the digits.

This dataset can be used to train diffusion models for video generation.


## Three other versions of this dataset:
1. [Medium Version](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/yichengs/captioned-moving-mnist-dataset-medium-version)
2. [Hard Version](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/yichengs/captioned-moving-mnist-dataset-hard-version)
3. [Random Version](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/yichengs/captioned-moving-mnist-dataset-random-version)
